trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by the Visual Basic Application Model when the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm*> property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 應用程式模型所擲回這個例外狀況時<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm*>屬性尚未設定。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm*>

trans-unit.source: The Visual Basic Application Model requires that the application set the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A> property before running the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnRun%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 應用程式模型需要應用程式設定<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A>屬性，才能執行<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnRun%2A>方法。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnRun%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the property is not set, the Visual Basic Application Model raises this exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定的屬性，Visual Basic 應用程式模型就會引發這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extending the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[擴充 Visual Basic 應用程式模型](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For information about how to set the startup form by using the **Project Designer**, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如需有關如何透過設定啟動表單資訊**專案設計工具**，請參閱[應用程式] 頁面上，[專案設計工具 (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.NoStartupFormException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.NoStartupFormException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Basic Application Model requires that the application set the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A> property before running the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnRun%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 應用程式模型需要應用程式設定<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A>屬性，才能執行<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnRun%2A>方法。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.OnRun%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.MainForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the property is not set, the Visual Basic Application Model raises this exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定的屬性，Visual Basic 應用程式模型就會引發這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extending the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[擴充 Visual Basic 應用程式模型](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.NoStartupFormException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.NoStartupFormException>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.NoStartupFormException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |Property|Value| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error-message string.|
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| |屬性 |值 | |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|Null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.NoStartupFormException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.NoStartupFormException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: 內容`message`參數為了能讓人瞭解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端，才能確保這個字串已經被當地語系化為目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.NoStartupFormException> inherits from <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.NoStartupFormException>繼承自<xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception></xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.NoStartupFormException>

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the properties of the <xref:System.Exception> object as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定的屬性<xref:System.Exception>物件下表所示。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |Property|Value| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The `message` string.|
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| |屬性 |值 | |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|Null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|`message`字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.NoStartupFormException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.NoStartupFormException"></xref>使用序列化資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構所需的資料流上傳輸的例外狀況物件的還原序列化期間呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>保存所擲回的例外狀況的相關序列化的物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>物件，其中包含關於來源或目的端內容資訊。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.NoStartupFormException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.NoStartupFormException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: 內容`message`參數為了能讓人瞭解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端，才能確保這個字串已經被當地語系化為目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 做為前一個例外狀況直接結果應該包括在前一個例外狀況的參考就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值如果傳遞到建構函式，則為 null 參考<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ApplicationException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.ApplicationException>.</xref:System.ApplicationException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |Property|Value| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The `inner` reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The `message` string.|
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| |屬性 |值 | |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`inner`參考。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|`message`字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> object describing the error.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>描述錯誤的物件。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> object that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>造成目前例外狀況物件。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> parameter is not a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>參數不是 null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)，會在處理內部例外的 catch 區塊中引發目前的例外狀況。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>
